```{r,include=FALSE}
remotes::install_github("Larsvanderlaan/RStatisticalSoftware/hal9001")

```

```{r}
library(hal9001)
n=150
X = matrix(cbind(rnorm(n),rnorm(n),rnorm(n)), nrow=n)

y = rowSums(X) + rnorm(n)

f=fit_hal(X,y,screen_basis_main_terms=T,family = "gaussian", cv_select = T, return_x_basis = T)


```
